creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Headdress ropes attached to small square of brown cloth. Cloth square 2 in. x 2 1/2 in. Two thin braids extend 29 in. long. One thick braid extends 45 in. long and has 4 1/2 in. of turquoise and coral beads at the end. Similar to 77.77.114. Over all dimensions
title: Headdress Ropes
